m_szDocSumamry: Introducing Air Maintenance Technology from Goodyear August 25th, 2011 by Glenn Meyers   Tires that self-inflate will be great! Ask the folks at The Goodyear Tire & Rubber Company  and you’re likely to hear that the days of manually adding air to under-inflated tires will soon be a distant memory. This is thanks to a new technology in development called Air Maintenance Technology (AMT).
